data.why:
* Directory/CD/DVD indexing module - with incremental backup script
    / CD&DVD indexing script / backup & index viewer GUI script / backup
    restore script

    * Web file leech module

    Various utility modules: * Clearcase control * File utilities, path
    manipulation * string utilities * Microsoft Word & Excel file
    creation/manipulation via OLE * Script info & usage logging (via
    mail) * XML simple extensions

    Tk : * Hash 'directory' tree view with thumbnail contents view mega
    widget * Hash/Array HList megawidget
